channel.title: Design on Product Designer, CDO at buzzvil
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Product Designer, CDO at buzzvil

item.title: Chief Design Officer @buzzvil
item.description: It was time to take a step back from product management and put a stronger focus on Design, as the team grew in numbers and our business now needs to better control our design outcomes.

item.title: Design peer reviews to support our team growth
item.description: I always hope to see my teammates collaborate more. Now that we are at a stage of faster growth, more fellow designers are going to join us and it felt like a good timing to push forward this all peer-review strategy.
